messages.subject: T.V./video gaps
messages.msgSnippet: I forgot to mention a few things: Wyl is almost 5 1/2 We don t screen anything for scary stuff-he self-regulates that wonderfully. We don t watch much
messages.messageBody:
I forgot to mention a few things:

Wyl is almost 5 1/2
We don't screen anything for "scary" stuff-he self-regulates that
wonderfully.
We don't watch much t.v./videos at all-adults or family (we have been
watching the olympics nightly as Wyl is very interested in gymnastics-but not the
WOMEN'S! lol, but we tape it the night before and watch it the next evening so we
can fast forward through the "other stuff" and commercials-plus, we can pause
to look at stuff in detail)... maybe an hour a week family watching? No, more
like 2 or 3... we just do other stuff... I tend to watch a lot of news
programs I have taped in the evening after the boys have gone to bed, while I'm
working on the computer, but other than that, we don't do much but a 2-3 more
hours of sci-fi (a week) as adults.

Hope that covers it...

Sang


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
